creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: rolling rock formation at LR with tall tree near L bank; rolling embankment in background with small hut at center and waterfall at UL; a man stands on the L shore talking to a seated man in a boat at L
marks: Signature, Marks, and Seal URQ: [ 長元徽写意 ]
title: Landscape after Ike Taiga
